author: Savvy1ne
body: They’re actually a subsidiary of DXC Technology which is an American based company operated by Chinese who’s set up through the Cayman Islands.  DXC acquired them when they were CRF before they switched their business model and became SOS Limited.

author: Savvy1ne
body: They’re actually a subsidiary of DXC technology who are American.  They operate out of China, in the process of moving their operations to the United States (recently entered a joint venture agreement in Wisconsin for a power plant, and intend to acquire one more in Wisconsin and the other in Maine).  They’re “technically” through the Cayman Islands.
